Text: Jess walks into your office looking like she's got something on her mind.

Speaker: Jess
Text: I've been looking at trends in the industry and I think the team would benefit from learning an up and coming tech stack called "Paper".

Speaker: Jess
Text: The best part is that there is a Paper stack workshop that runs over next week.

Speaker: Jess
Text: Yes| but the skills gain from something like this will more than make up for the lost time.
